body_html:
Closing for now. Feel free to re-open if it's still an issue when synced after 70674b9

(FWIW I tried in a nightly, and memory usage does fluctuate a bit which I assume is due to buffering, but it doesn't seem to grow over a few minutes)

body:
Closing for now. Feel free to re-open if it's still an issue when synced after https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/70674b950ab48f913ed1c99e48c4162287595d46

(FWIW I tried in a nightly, and memory usage does fluctuate a bit which I assume is due to buffering, but it doesn't seem to grow over a few minutes)
